"A.P.239/5/15/14:00": "Other reactions have disappeared. We can relax now..."
"This isn't... This isn't over yet, Yu-chan."
"This open wound, that sealed [Apprentice], is due to the influence of the [Profound Darkness]."
"As long as the [Profound Darkness] remains, this seal will not hold and \"it\" will come out again."
"It will be here on Lillipa in other places. We also can't deny the possibility of leaks either."
"Currently, it hasn't found a suitable host, but it will likely go after one, if it happens find one."
"So once the conditions are right, It will appear again."
"They say bugs can survive anywhere. Really, this troublesome Dark Falz. As the first host, where do you think it gets this from?"
"Geez...I wonder how much of an impact the latest host was?"
"We almost became like that too..."
"But that didn't happen, thanks to Afin and <%me>."
"What? You don't want to say it, but they did help save us. Did they not?"
"I never asked for this."
"Honestly, you're so..."
"You should learn to thank others who you care about, Yu-chan."
"I show my regards through my actions...!"
"And how's that working for you, Yu-chan?"
"Oh, I see. You're too shy to tell them. I understand now, how cute."
"Don't be absurd."
"Of course I'm grateful to Afin and <%me>."
"Thanks to them, I'm myself again. I will never be able to repay them, nor will I ever forget."
"<%me> helped from my chains and set me free."
"Afin never lost hope that I could be saved. Nothing I could ever do will repay their kindness to me."
"Eh? Did you call for me?"
"Auroraaaaaaaa!"
"It's not my fault. You're the one who got too carried away."
"Yu-nee, what were you talking about, regarding <%me> and I?"
"Uhh, it was...nothing!"
"We sealed [Apprentice], however it could reappear at any time."
"And not only do we have to deal with the [Profound Darkness], but its Dark Falz entourage as well."
"We don't have time to talk, we need to get back to the ship, now!"
"Do you suppose I've said something?"
"Nah, Yu-chan is just too shy. She's cute when she opens up."
"However, helping people is my speciality. I'm sure she'll talk about herself more later."
"I don't even know what we're talking about."
"Hehe."
"Alright, you should probably head back now. Yu-chan might get sad if we leave her alone for too long."
